title: Exposure
description: Jackson Chase served with the New Zealand special forces for many years, but a mission in Afghanistan leads him into a world of intrigue and betrayal that will put all of his skills to the test.From a high stakes rescue mission to a worldwide manhunt and ultimately to the potential assassination of a foreign leader, Chase and his team must unravel the knot tied by a spy gone bad.The action is true to life and hard hitting as Connor Black introduces Jackson Chase, an exciting new character with a quick wit and fierce sense of loyalty and duty.(Exposure is a novella. At a touch under 30,000 words, it would come to about 120 pages on paper.)
author: Connor Black
